description: Thaietnamese truck serving dishes with sweet, spicy, sour and salty flavors to excite your entire palate!  Run by Top Chef finalist Lisa Fernandes, you'll see that this is a real mobile kitchen. Her food is spicy, sweet, salty, sour and everything has a crunch. With a massive following of regulars who get food from Sweet Chili multiple times a week, it's easy to see why they are addicted. The streets of NYC will never be the same, thanks to Chef Fernandes and Sweet Chili!
name: Sweet Chili
